metadata.description: Generates comprehensive documentation for any codebase with C4 architecture diagrams, API docs, ADRs, and more

plugins.name: claude-doc-gen
plugins.description: Analyzes any codebase and generates comprehensive documentation: C4 architecture (all 4 levels), API endpoints with sequence diagrams, ADRs, security analysis, DevOps/CI-CD, data layer with ERDs, event architecture, testing strategy, and code quality. Outputs markdown with Mermaid diagrams, then builds a static HTML site via MkDocs.
